use nyc_taxi_ldw
GO

USE nyc_taxi_ldw
GO
-- Create rate_code view
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS silver.vw_rate_code
GO

CREATE VIEW silver.vw_rate_code
AS SELECT rate_code_id,rate_code
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/rate_code.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )AS rate_code
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        rate_code_id TINYINT,
        rate_code VARCHAR(20) 
        )
    GO

SELECT * FROM silver.vw_rate_code
GO

-- Create view for payment_type
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS silver.vw_payment_type
GO

CREATE VIEW silver.vw_payment_type
AS SELECT payment_type,payment_type_desc
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/payment_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    )
    WITH 
    (
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    )AS payment_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH
    (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc VARCHAR(20) '$.payment_type_desc'
    )
    GO

SELECT * FROM silver.vw_payment_type
GO





-- Create view for trip_data_green

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS silver.vw_trip_data_green
GO
CREATE VIEW silver.vw_trip_data_green
AS 
SELECT
    TOP 100 
    result.filepath(1) AS year,
    result.filepath(2) AS month,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'silver/trip_data_green_csv/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH ( 
            VendorID INT,
            lpep_pickup_datetime DATETIME2(7),
            lpep_dropoff_datetime DATETIME2(7),
            store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
            RatecodeID INT,
            PULocationID INT,
            DOLocationID INT,
            passenger_count INT,
            trip_distance FLOAT,
            fare_amount FLOAT,
            extra FLOAT,
            mta_tax FLOAT,
            tip_amount FLOAT,
            tolls_amount FLOAT,
            ehail_fee INT,
            improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
            total_amount FLOAT,
            payment_type INT,
            trip_type INT,
            congestion_surcharge FLOAT
    )AS [result]
    
    GO

SELECT * FROM silver.vw_trip_data_green
GO

-- here look partition purning direct go to this partition o partition purning in parquet

FROM silver.vw_trip_data_green
WHERE year = '2021' AND month = '02';
